import _toConsumableArray from"/home/shakthivel/Documents/mini-project/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray.js";//dummy data
var transactions=[{id:1},{id:2}];var contextReducer=function contextReducer(state,action){var transactions;switch(action.type){case'DELETE_TRANSACTION':transactions=state.filter(function(t){return t.id!==action.payload;});sessionStorage.setItem('transactions',JSON.stringify(transactions));return transactions;case'ADD_TRANSACTION':transactions=[action.payload].concat(_toConsumableArray(state));sessionStorage.setItem('transactions',JSON.stringify(transactions));return transactions;default:return state;}};export default contextReducer;
